name: Car Parking Crazy Park
description:
Car Parking Crazy Park Game - Park your car!

Great game for those who do not know how to park correctly. Different versions of parking spaces with different levels of complexity. The abundance of game cards, a variety of cars and cool music! Learn how to properly steer a new game. Simulator is suitable for all ages before you get behind the wheel, first go through all the levels in our game.
- The unusual stylish design of the game will help you immediately enjoy the realistic control. You need to turn the steering wheel, press the pedals to switch the gearbox, everything is like in a real car, and even better! Here you exactly safe and no one will yell at you because of what you have entered into another car!

Features:
- Addictive gameplay
- Realistic car physics
- Great in-game music
- Amazing and colorful 2D high definition graphics

How To Play:
- Move left joystick up to move car forward.
- Move Left joystick down to move the car in reverse direction.
- Move Right joystick left/right direction to turn the car.
